title: Knowledge Sharing Session | Trends in Technology
description: IEEE NITK hosted Ganesh Shankar, the CEO of FluxGen Technologies Bengaluru, where he elucidated his journey from an engineering undergraduate to the head of a flourishing startup. Through his story, he inspired the audience to face different ups and downs of life with confidence. Several aspects of engineering and entrepreneurship were discussed. He also shared his thoughts on preparations that a student needs to do before entering the corporate world.
